item.description:
Prepare yourself for a fabulous day of shopping and pampering during Shop & Talk 2012, a can't-miss girls' night out. Lets spend the day in a fun, relaxed environment and enjoy cocktails and music, while sampling from Boston's finest boutiques, spas, salons and more. Vendors scheduled to be in attendance include SKM Jewelers, Joann Haysenn Designs, Bona Clara, Skiler and Caryn's Corner. Tickets to the event include a gift bag, and there will be a trip giveaway for three nights at the Valentin Imperial Maya.

Tickets are $40 but if you sign up with Goldstar (goldstar.com) you can purchase them for $10-$20 (plus service fee)

Yay!!
item.name: Women's Fashion, Plus Food, Drinks and Fun!!
